author: Christopher Livingston
description: It doesn't sound like it's a full-court press on Hello Games' planet-sized fantasy sandbox.
title: Sean Murray just crushed my hopes of playing Light No Fire anytime soon by describing the dev team as 'tiny' and working 'in the background' at Hello Games

author: Lincoln Carpenter
description: Keeps them off the iPad, at least.
title: 'Child labor is unbeatable': Baldur's Gate 3 players discover how to build an army of unkillable kids through the power of polymorph and German media laws

author: Wes Fenlon
description: Borland C++ Turbo, you've got some explaining to do.
title: For 33 years, a 'true story' about the 'resonant frequency of a chicken's skull cavity' written in an MS-DOS help file has fueled an urban legend that a certain sound wavelength will make chicken heads explode

author: Morgan Park
description: If you were on the fence about The Dark Ages back in May, it's a no brainer now.
title: The standout Steam Black Friday deal is undoubtedly Doom: The Dark Ages for 50% off

author: Andy Chalk
description: Splash Damage split from Tencent following the cancellation of Transformers Reactivate, and was acquired by an unnamed private equity investor in September.
title: 2 months after being acquired by private equity, Splash Damage is making major layoffs so it can 'remain agile,' even though it hasn't released a game since 2020

author: Andy Chalk
description: Don't need a notice if everyone's doing it.
title: Epic boss Tim Sweeney thinks stores like Steam should stop labelling games as being made with AI: 'It makes no sense,' he says, because 'AI will be involved in nearly all future production'

author: Lauren Morton
description: After announcing a delay to May 2026, Paralives has shared a long video of new uninterrupted gameplay that's actually made me optimistic.
title: Despite getting delayed, Paralives looks like it's avoiding Inzoi's biggest flaw

author: Tyler Wilde
description: If you're struggling to connect to an online game or service right now, this is probably the culprit.
title: A major online services outage is affecting Fortnite, Arc Raiders, Battle.net, PSN, and more

author: Morgan Park
description: We're hitting a queue here in North America, suggesting everyone's trying to log back in at once. No luck so far.
title: Yes, Arc Raiders servers are down

author: Tyler Colp
description: Blizzard has finally put a date on when the MMO will change forever.
title: World of Warcraft: Midnight might be the MMO's biggest expansion yet, and it's coming out in March

author: Joshua Wolens
description: What more could you ask?
title: Galaxy Princess Zorana is like if you made BG3 passive checks into a whole game, a great tale of political intrigue, and will give you like 4,000 ways to die embarrassingly

author: Andy Chalk
description: CD Projekt's once-troubled cyber-RPG has now sold more than 35 million copies
title: Cyberpunk 2077 is now CD Projekt's 'main source of income,' and sales are outpacing The Witcher 3: Its latest milestone is 'a better result than The Witcher 3 was able to achieve in the same post-release time frame'

author: Joshua Wolens
description: Shores of Vaelithar was made by humans. It promises.
title: The fantasy RPG that started as a viral AI-made video is 'free of AI-generated content,' pledges its maker

author: James Bentley
description: We think it's been the best for seven years now.
title: Turns out the best sub-$100 gaming headset deal this Black Friday is a HyperX model once again, and that's no bad thing

author: Rick Lane
description: Also adds deserters, random events and "fast mode".
title: Mount & Blade 2: Bannerlord gets free patch alongside War Sails DLC that's so big, the 17,000 word update run more than twice the length of Age of Empires 2's 'legendarily long' patch notes

author: Andy Edser
description: It doesn't shoot lightning, though. At least it shouldn't, anyway.
title: Unlimited powaaaaah: Our high performance gaming laptop pick has $1,200 knocked off the price this Black Friday

description: The catch? They're both wired.
title: Get the whole setup: a fantastic Hall effect keyboard and lightweight gaming mouse for only $65 this Black Friday

author: Jacob Fox
description: Dare I say I'm tentatively optimistic about a Microsoft feature?

description: It's only in one color though.
title: The best budget controller I've reviewed is also the most reasonably priced way of getting Hall effect this Black Friday

description: "You won't believe what I paid for this," I'd say, as everyone else in the room silently judged me.
title: I'd be very proud to show off this sleek RTX 5080 gaming laptop, especially if I'd saved $1,300 in the Black Friday sales

author: Rory Norris
description: There's a science to making the best loadout.
title: After seeing the science, I hereby vow to never underestimate or misuse Arc Raiders' attachments ever again

description: It still hurts that this kit was half the price barely two months ago.

description: Come join us on the voyage of the damned.

description: Prepare to enter the Temple of Elemental Evil…again.
title: 22 years since launch, a classic Dungeons & Dragons adventure from the developer of Bloodlines is finally coming to Steam

author: Jeremy Laird
description: Altman hopes when people see the former Apple design guru's device they will say, 'that's it?' It's going to be here in under two years so I guess we'll see.
title: Sam Altman says the prototype AI 'thing' he's making with Jony Ive gives the 'vibe' of 'sitting in the most beautiful cabin by a lake in the mountains' and I'm left wondering if he's ever listened to the noises coming out of the hole under his nose

description: And it's available in three different colors.
title: TMR sticks, 1000 Hz polling and a charging stand top the spec sheet of one of Black Friday's best PC controller deals

description: It's a bit of a looker, too

description: A read speed of nearly 14 GB/s is nothing to sneeze at.

author: Nick Evanson
description: Forget about the watts and pay attention to the sockets.

description: Activision's shooter was last beaten at its own game in the US by the original Gears of War.
